name: Zero Sum (Corey Hardt)
description:
Zero Sum

A game of math-under-pressure. Do you have the brainspeed to go all the way?

Made by @corey_hardt over a few weeks for #ChainLetterJam. Music by Antti Luode.
May 2021

Thanks to Le Slo for nominating me for the jam, in which you make a small game somehow inspired by the game the previous participant made. Here are all the games in this chain:

1. Wordman Saves the Day by miziziziz (the original)
2. Word Bounce by Vimlark
3. Word Bounce 3D by Niborious
4. Arithmetic Bounce by patrickgh3
5. Add to Odd by Le Slo
6. Zero Sum (this game)
